subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Venus Williams defeated her sister Serena by 5-7, 6-1, 6-0 to reach the semifinals of the WTA Tour’s season-ending Sony Ericsson Championships in Doha, Qatar, a match Serena Williams called her worst of the year. Venus Williams won on her fifth match point, and is 3-0 in round-robin play in a tournament that features the top eight players. Serena Williams dropped to 1-1 but can still advance to the semifinals if she defeats Elena Dementieva on Friday. The Williams sisters are 9-9 in career matchups.
